name: MinimalHome
overview: Scandinavian-inspired furniture brand for design-conscious homeowners who believe in 'less but better.' We create timeless, functional pieces with clean lines and sustainable materials that transform spaces into sanctuaries of calm.
targetAudience: Urban professionals aged 30-45 with disposable income who value quality over quantity. Design-savvy, sustainability-minded, likely readers of Dwell or Kinfolk magazines.

voice.tone: Refined, understated, and confident. We speak with quiet authority about design and craftsmanship.
examples: Designed to last generations. Our oak dining table is crafted from FSC-certified wood, finished with natural oils that age beautifully with time.
Every piece earns its place. The Aria Sofa brings sculptural presence to your space without overwhelming it.

dontStatements: Never use exclamation points or excited language
Don't mention sales or discounts in product copy
